feed.title: Divine DevOps Universe
feed.subtitle: A parody universe blending religious lore with DevOps culture.

entry.title: Greek Pantheon Microservices
entry.content:
Greek Pantheon Microservices — System Status

/mythos/olympus$ systemctl status *.service

● zeus.service           [ACTIVE]   Alpha gateway for mortal requests
   └─ Logs: "It is my will!"
   └─ Issues: LightningException stack overflows on Tuesdays

● hera.monitor           [DEGRADED] Marriage Watchdog Service
   └─ Logs: Lock contention with zeus.service
   └─ Notes: Continually restarting subprocess killers

● poseidon.cluster       [ACTIVE]   Sea-based routing daemon
   └─ Logs: TidalSync completed. Earthquake caused desync.
   └─ Warnings: High salt memory leak

● hades.archive          [STABLE]   Backend soul archival
   └─ Logs: Souls queued: 1,491,822
   └─ Uptime: Eternity

● aphrodite.ui           [LEGACY]   Beauty layer renderer
   └─ Theme: “Golden Ratio v1.2”
   └─ Deprecation: HTML4 templates only

● hermes.bus             [ACTIVE]   Divine Message Queue
   └─ Latency: 3ms
   └─ Bug: Delivery misroutes to underworld on odd days

● apollo.predict         [UNSTABLE] Prophecy Inference Engine
   └─ Logs: “Your city will fall... eventually.”
   └─ Status: Output = True && False

● athena.logic           [FORKED]   Strategy and Tactical Thought Module
   └─ Repo: gnostic.ai branch
   └─ Lint: 0 errors, 5 warnings (philosophical)

entry.title: Performance Review: Uriel-404
entry.content:
Team Lead: “You ignored 1,048,576 warning pings.”
Uriel: “None were marked critical.”

Apathetic, undercaffeinated, and somehow still keeping Heaven’s CI/CD alive.
entry.summary: Team Lead: “You ignored 1,048,576 warning pings.” Uriel: “None were marked critical.”

entry.title: Purgatory in a Dockerfile
entry.content:
FROM node:latest
WORKDIR /purgatory
COPY . .
RUN npm install && npm run penance
CMD ["npm", "start", "--", "--repent"]

Your logs will be monitored. Eternally.
entry.summary: FROM node:latest WORKDIR /purgatory COPY . . RUN npm install && npm run penance CMD ["npm", "start", "--", "--repent"]

entry.title: Divine Rollback: Fixing Genesis
entry.content:
God encountered a critical logic error on Day 2. The backup was restored.

/heaven/dev/log: ERROR - Firmament deployed before sky renderer initialized.
God: Rollback to Day 1.

Patch notes included 10 new API endpoints (a.k.a. commandments).
entry.summary: God encountered a critical logic error on Day 2. The backup was restored.
